attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request the prime minister to stand down at the earliest possible opportunity because he has lost the trust of the British People.  Also, that the incoming Prime Minister immediately calls a general election as he does not have a viable mandate from the country.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
